title: homework6
section: Test RMSE function w NA values
text:
Test RMSE function w NA values

#manual change with missing
resp[3:5] <- c(NA_real_)

#test function w and w/o argument to deal with NAs
getRMSE(pred,resp)

[1] NA

getRMSE(pred,resp, na.rm = TRUE)

[1] 0.8837701

title: homework6
text:
Test MAE function

set.seed(10)
n <- 100
x <- runif(n)
resp <- 3 + 10 * x + rnorm(n)
pred <- predict(lm(resp ~ x), data.frame(x))

getMAE(pred,resp)

[1] 0.8155776

title: homework6
text:
Test MAE function w/ missing

resp[7:8] <- c(NA_real_)

getMAE(pred,resp)

[1] NA

getMAE(pred,resp, na.rm = TRUE)

[1] 0.8175681

title: homework6
text:
Test Wrapper Function

#reset pred and resp
set.seed(10)
n <- 100
x <- runif(n)
resp <- 3 + 10 * x + rnorm(n)
pred <- predict(lm(resp ~ x), data.frame(x))

MAE Test

predEVAL(pred,resp,method="MAE")

[1] "Mean Adjusted Error is 0.8156"


RMSE Test

predEVAL(pred,resp,method="RMSE")

[1] "Root Mean Square Error is 0.9181"


Both Metrics Test

predEVAL(pred,resp)

[1] "Root Mean Square Error is 0.9181 / Mean Adjusted Error is 0.8156"

title: homework6
text:
Test WRAPPER with NA

resp[7:8] <- c(NA_real_)

predEVAL(pred,resp)

[1] "Root Mean Square Error is NA / Mean Adjusted Error is NA"

predEVAL(pred,resp,na.rm=TRUE)

[1] "Root Mean Square Error is 0.9258 / Mean Adjusted Error is 0.8176"

title: homework6
section: Test passing incorrect data to function
text:
Test passing incorrect data to function

#create test vectors and df
a <- c("evan","debbie","canes")
b <- seq(1:3)
df <- data.frame(a,b)

predEVAL(a,b)

[1] "choose two numeric vectors"


Error in predEVAL(a, b): choose two numeric vectors

predEVAL(pred[1:3],df)

[1] "choose two numeric vectors"


Error in predEVAL(pred[1:3], df): choose two numeric vectors
